wikipedia_page.main: John Raymond Hobbs MRCS, FRCP, FRCPath, FRCPaed (17 April 1929 – 13 July 2008) was a professor who was at the forefront of the techniques of clinical immunology, protein biochemistry and bone marrow transplantation, specifically in child health.

response: *John Raymond Hobbs, whose team set up the world's first bone marrow donor register.
